definition: to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited
to sign one's name/visa/variant of 籤|签[qian1]
inscribed bamboo stick (used in divination, gambling, drawing lots etc)/small wood sliver/label/tag

sentences.english: Its citizens will also be allowed to travel visa-free in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 土耳其公民也被允许免签前往欧洲旅游。

sentences.english: Moscow suspended its visa free policy with Turkey earlier this week.
sentences.chinese: 俄方也在这周早些时候暂停了土耳其的免签政策。

sentences.english: Travelers from VWP program nations must have a passport that can be scanned by an electronic reader.
sentences.chinese: 免签国家的访客必须持可由电子扫描的护照。

sentences.english: Mexico City is mulling visa-free access for Chinese visitors.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥城正酝酿对中国游客开放入境免签。

definition: Schengen, village in Luxemburg, location of the 1985 signing of the agreement to create the Schengen area 申根區|申根区[Shen1 gen1 qu1]
the Schengen area, a passport-free zone in Europe
abbr. for 波斯尼亞和黑塞哥維那|波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那[Bo1 si1 ni2 ya4 he2 Hei1 sai4 ge1 wei2 na4] Bosnia and Herzegovina
Republic of Palau or Belau (Pacific island nation)

pinyin: An1 ti2 gua1 he2 Ba1 bu4 da2
